channel.title: Homes on TorosGo
channel.description: Recent content in Homes on TorosGo

item.description: I am Cloud Solution Architect at Microsoft. My expertise is Cloud Computing, Azure, Aws, Project and Team Management, System Engineering, Software Development Methodologies, Devops and Architecting. I am interested in Linux, Containers, Kubernetes, web services, social networks, big data, data analytics, Iot, disaster recovery, high availability, performance. I like sports and travelling.
